explanation: [0-0] On a multicolored playground stands a group of children in black clothes. In front of them is a man in a white short-sleeved shirt, and in front of him is a girl in a white short-sleeved shirt. The man in white holds a board in each hand. The playground is surrounded by fences, outside of which are trees and grass. At the top is a yellow caption that reads "WHO ARE YOU CHOOSING?! PT.3".

[0-6] The man in white is talking and first raises the card in his left hand, then raises the card in his right hand. Then the children begin to run in different directions to make their choices. Captions appear at the top: on the left is a yellow caption that reads "Van Dijk", with the Dutch flag below it, and on the right is a black caption that reads "Marquinhos", with the Brazilian flag below it. Then the captions at the top disappear, and the man in white moves to the left with the cards in both hands.
